action-group.diy-instructions:
Once all the files have been modified and uploaded to your site, point your browser to the "install_modbbcode.php" script (or click the highlighted link above if you are using AutoMOD) and follow the instructions. Once that is complete, you can delete the "install_mapbbcode.php" script.
You can configure MapBBCode settings in the ACP under the "POSTING" tab.
